body.name: Cute Weighted Microwavable Plush Toys – 14'' Cartoon Cat Weighted Stuffed Animals Heating Plushies, 1.5 Lbs Weighted Plush Doll Pillow Birthday Gifts for Adults Kids
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 18 mins
features: 💖 Coolable & Heated Material - Made with high-quality plush, our 1.15 lb weighted stuffed cat is soft and huggable. With natural flaxseeds & lavender filling, the stuffed cat plush is easy to heat in microwave to relieve a various of pain, such as neck, shoulder, and backaches. As an alternative, freeze it for 2-3 hours to cool down the temperature and ease bruising, swelling, and sprains.

💖 Comfortable Microwavable Weighted Plush - Whether you're in need of a warm embrace on chilly days or a cooling touch to ease discomfort, this plush toy is designed to provide the perfect temperature for your needs.
💖 Adorable Design - This adorable and cute stuffed animal cat has an appealing appearance for all genders that makes it ideal for those looking for something unique!

💖 Occassions - The cute microwavable weighted sloth plush can not only be used as home decoration to your room, living room, bedroom, office, car, but also can be used as a pillow, which has a good sense of experience and can be placed in the car or sofa and other places.

💖 Ideal Gifts - So cute of this microwavable kitty cat is! Also an sweet gift ideas for Birthday, Christmas, Valentine's Day! The weighted plush is a very practical and ceremonial gift, suitable as a gift for children, family members or friends.

reviews.reviewText: This is a very cute item my child loved. The issue is that it didn’t come with any instructions on how to heat it or cool it.
